regen.absent_element: confirmation of the update of the execution host queue status
regen.new_specification: Libra shall confirm the update of the execution host queue status after a job is scheduled or removed to ensure system accuracy.

regen.absent_element: handling execution failures or exceptions during queue status updates
regen.new_specification: If a job fails to execute or resources cannot be reserved, the system shall roll back the queue status update and log the error state.
Before updating the queue status upon job removal, the libra shall verify that the job has indeed completed or was terminated.

label: After the execution host queue status is updated, the libra shall send the information about the additional load on the queue and node to the central information store.
absence: update status information of the cluster
